data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gray, Andrew R. (2018): Review of the genus Cruziohyla (Anura: Phyllomedusidae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4450 (4): 401-426, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4450.4.1|6 occurrences
